snippet: Green-Wood Cemetery is the setting for a production of Thornton Wilder’s “Our Town.”
abstract: Claudia La Rocco reviews production of Thorton Wilder play Our Town at Green-Wood Cemetery in Brooklyn; play is directed by James Presson and presented by the Green-Wood Historic Fund.
lead_paragraph: Green-Wood Cemetery is the setting for a production of Thornton Wilder’s “Our Town.”

headline.seo: Thornton Wilder’s ‘Our Town’ at Green-Wood Cemetery
headline.main: Amid the Tombstones, a Look Back at Life
headline.print_headline: Amid the Tombstones, a Look Back at Life
